Prologue.Line: No, not good-bye! When I wake up, I'll find you. And then there will be no lies. We're gonna be friends for real. Promise me, Naminé

Unaccountable Actions.Line: So, now we've taken two journeys. One to stop the darkness from spreading, and the other to put all the lost hearts back where they belong. To tell the truth, neither one was easy, but I sure was glad to be the cricket to write down what happened. Two journeys, both sittin' quiet right here in these two books. But now, looks like the only thing left in one of 'em is a single line. Of course, maybe that's because they're the only words this book was meant to hold and it's time to close it for good. But...who exactly is this "Naminé"? Uh-huh. I certainly didn't write it. And you know I never once let the journal out of my sight. I don't know when anybody woulda had a chance to...Of course, but how? All the other pages are completely blank. Somebody to explore the data from the inside...I guess Chip and Dale musta figured things out. Huh... Curious...Who could that be? I-I don't remember writin' this in the journal! Who could that be? I-I don't remember writin' this in the journal!

A mysterious message? Hmm... Their hurting will be mended? Gosh, Jiminy. Sounds like somebody needs help and doesn't know what to do. Let's get to the bottom of this. Sure, the words you wrote are gone, but that doesn't mean the journal is empty. Hmm, isn't there something else we can try? And I think we know just the guy to do it! Am I right, fellas? Your journey with the real Sora was all recorded into data. So he IS the Sora we know from before. Just another version. What was that about? Well ya see, somebody left a strange message in Jiminy's journal. And the only way to find out who wrote it is by carefully analyzing every entry inside. Hmm... "Their hurting will be---" What is it?  Can you hear me? You gotta go after whoever that was. Fast! Watch out! They're the Heartless! It's time for you to use your powers! You have that now 'cause you've gained the power to fight. It's also your power to survive. You're gonna hafta fight sometimes. But don't ever forget---keep your light burning strong. It's time to open the door. Just hold out the Keyblade.
Do you know what they're up to? What are you talking about? This data is a new Sora? What was the message? Hey! There's someone in the monitor!

Nope. Gawrsh, maybe if we could get in there somehow and fix the data, we could figure out what's wrong. Yeah, are ya sayin' he's not the same Sora we met on our journey before? 'Scuse me, Your Majesty, but what exactly is it we're doin' here? Gawrsh, I thought that Sora was alone in there.

Your Majesty! Everything's ready! Jiminy's journal---I think it's gone completely nuts! That's not what I mean! I don't know what's causing it exactly, but there's something wrong with the worlds inside the journal. And we can't analyze that message for you, either! Hey, that's it! We could look for somebody already in the journal and ask them to explore the worlds and repair the data. That's a great idea, Goofy! See, Dale and I found a way to rewrite Sora's data! An' since he's still Sora, he can help us restore all the worlds to the way they're supposed to be. Yikes! Wait here. We'll run next door and take a look. Be right back!

Your Majesty! What Chipper said! Hey, what's goin' on!? Nuts? Where? Chipper means we gave the Sora who's in the datascape the power to use his Keyblade! Now he can help us un-glitch all the journal data. ...We think. I got no idea.
Who...are YOU? Did I get myself lost? Where could he have gone? Use my what? Oh! Hmm? What's this?

My Island.Line: Huh? How'd I get back here? That voice again. Who are you? You even know my name. Have we met somewhere before? And so, we've never met before, but you seem to know who I am and we're friends, is that it? I don't understand. What do I have to do? Why's that? Hmm, I don't know what's going on, but are you saying you want me to explore the island? I got it! I found that already. These blocks! What are they doing here on the island? All right! I'll ask around!

Sora. First, are you okay, Sora? Well, sort of. I'm Mickey Mouse. I've never met the you in this world, but I do know you, Sora, and Sora knows me. You could say we're really good friends! Ya see, I'm from another world and--- Gosh, it's kind of a long story. Anyway, there's this mystery me and my friends are tryin' to solve. But we can't get to your world, so we were hopin' that maybe you could help us out. Well, we're searchin' for an answer somewhere in that world you're in. And you're the only one who can find it. Yeah, that's it exactly! And if there's anything you need, I'll be right here. First, look for anything odd. Welp, that's part of our mystery. Thanks! Oh, and remember, Sora. We might be worlds apart, but you just say the word and I'll do everything I can to guide you. No matter what happens, I'm always with you in spirit.

The King's Chronicles; Destiny Islands.Line: After talking to your friends on the beach, you figured out that more mysterious blocks were popping up all over the island. They also told you that the suspicious person in the black hood was last seen heading to someplace called the Secret Place.

The Keyhole's the Place.Line: I heard he came this way. Am I too late?Maybe he went through this door. Whoa! Wh-what now!? That voice... Who's there? Mickey? Guess I'm okay, but what was that? It's you! Huh? I don't understand that. Is it a riddle? So, what am I supposed to do with that? The Keyhole's...the place? Hey! Wait! Huh? What's that? There's something weird here, Mickey. The guy in black left behind this...uh...well, it looks like a Keyhole. Hmm. He said, "To make this place whole, the Keyhole's the place." He must have meant this. Roger that! I'll try it.

There's a road for the taking if you end our world's aching. This world has been connected....Now stand tied. There's a road for the taking...if you end our world's aching. To make this place whole, the Keyhole's the place.

Hm? What's that bright light? "There's a road for the taking if you end our world's aching." If only I knew what to do...Could it be...? Sora, what do ya see? Did he say anything to ya? The Keyhole's the place... I know. Sora, try using the Keyblade. You might be able to trigger something with it.
Gawrsh, what just happened? I think I'm seein' stars! Huh? Fellas! Look up there on the screen!
What!? N-not again! Just look at what's been added to the journal! Somebody's gone and written in a brand-new entry! What world could they mean? Ours?

Restoring the Island.Line: Whoa! What is this place!? Yeah, I think so. But...what's happened to our island? If I get rid of it, will the island be restored? Mm-hmm. I got it.
Sora, are you okay? I'm not sure, but whatever it is that's causin' the glitches must be There. I hope so, but be careful. Whatever's in there is powerful. Do ya think Sora's all right?

Wait, I'm tracking him now. Whoa! A new entry in the journal! Gee, now that can't be right. If the data was repaired, we should be seeing the things that were written inside my journal, right? But what we just saw---that never happened. Or, at least, I never wrote it down. Hm? Aha! We've found Sora!
What is it? Hey, look! You mean it's showing us stuff you don't know about?
"More hurts than the one we have just undone?" Hmm, I wonder what's goin' on inside the journal.

An Unfamiliar World.Line: Hey! Huh? How did I...? Mickey! Where am I? What happened to me now? Looks like some kind of town. Hey, wait! The island! What happened back on the island? Whew! Am I glad to hear that. So, now I'm in a strange town... But why? Is this place full of glitches, too? All right, I'll see what I can find.

Hey, Sora. Are you all right? You must've been taken someplace else. Tell me about what ya see around you. All the blocks disappeared. You did a great job, Sora. I don't know yet, but it could be. Would you mind checkin' it out and takin' a look around?

The King's Chronicles; Traverse Town I.Line: Something strange was happening in that world too. Huey, Dewey, and Louie decided to go investigate. You took off to find 'em, 'cause you promised Cid you'd bring 'em back safe and sound.

Memories of a Past Adventure.Line: Boy, does that bring back memories. That's where we met Sora on our first adventure. Wak! Wait! It's okay. Sora is a hero.

Oh yeah, I remember it, too. And also Yuffie, Aerith, Leon, too. Wonder how those guys are doin'. I got a question for ya. When the journal got all digitized, we found the old entries, right? So, does that mean the Pluto that woke Sora up is the Pluto that's just made of his data? Well, I'm wonderin' if there are data versions of all of us inside there, too. Oh, yeah!
Interesting. So that's where you three became friends. Why do ya ask, Goof? Huh, that's a good question. Jiminy, what do ya think? Hmm...You're right. I'm sure Sora will lead us to the answer.

I'm afraid, Your Majesty, that I don't actually have an answer to that question. As you know, the bugs are blocking our access to all of the data. It's quite possible that the entire data world has been fragmented, and that it's not a whole entity like we first thought. We just haven't figured it out. Oh, yeah!

The King's Chronicles; Traverse Town II.Line: When you found Huey, he had a fragment of light. You sent him back to Cid's and then found Dewey. He had a light fragment, too. Then you found Louie, and one more light fragment. They created a Keyhole, but with a piece missing. After that you took Louie and headed to Cid's.

Into the Keyhole.Line: Louie, run! Go to Cid's and wait! I hope you're happy with all the trouble you've caused! What's this? Hey, is this another fragment? Huh? Where'd he---? I knew it. This is exactly like the Keyhole that guy left for me back on the island. Mickey. I found another Keyhole like the one from the island. If this works the same way as the one before, all I gotta do is defeat whatever enemy is inside this Keyhole. That's right! I'll crawl inside and give that thing a piece of my mind. When I'm done, the town oughta be just fine. Hey, I gotta try. You can count on that!

Sora, can ya hear me? Lemme see if I understand... You're thinkin' this one might do the trick too? The source of the glitches for the world you're in might be inside that Keyhole? Okay, but just promise me that you'll be careful, Sora.

Under Mouse Arrest.Line: Did you see me? How do you like that? Huh? Why are the blocks still here? Am I missing something? Use my power? All right! Here goes! Yeah! But...what about that guy in the black hood? I mean, he could be the one behind this whole mess.

That Heartless's power must be lingering. But don't worry. All you gotta do is use YOUR power, Sora, and that'll end the glitches here once and for all! You bet. You've got a power that's yours alone. Use the Keyblade and lock that Keyhole for good! Thank you, Sora! Because of you, this world's mystery is solved. Hmm, it looks to me like a new message gets added every time a world inside the journal's repaired. Heartless!? We gotta check the rest of the castle now! It won't open! Hey! Hello! Anybody out there? Well, fellas, I hate to say this, but we're trapped. Huh? "Undo the hurt to unbar the way"? Well then, we'll just have to keep going, repairing the journal's data as fast as we can. I'm as worried as you are, Donald, but right now our best hope is fixing up the journal.

It's another new entry! Well, I sure didn't write anything like that in the journal. Here in the castle? But how? This is not our day. Huh? What's that? Woah! Your Majesty, I think Sora just might've reached the next world!
Yeah! Just like before. That's funny. We were there... Was Pluto with us? We're what!? But there could be Heartless roaming the castle. But we gotta do something about the castle. Okay.
Hey, do you fellas think that maybe the journal's tryin' to tell us somethin'? Gawrsh, we're tryin'. It said we've already undone some of it, right?

Wonderland.Line: Whoa, look at all these blocks. Yeah, I can hear you. But where'd the town go? I was just there a second ago. I don't know much about what's going on. What I do know is that, after I beat the enemy, I ended up right here. And from the looks of this place, this world could probably use some help. But if I do that, then I'm just gonna...get blasted off into the unknown again, won't I? I'm good with that! Yeah, I'll help in any way I can. I'll go and track down whatever it is that you need me to take care of. Who's that? The Heartless! I've got this. Stay back! You okay? Who me? I'm Sora. And you? What's wrong? What are you saying? That she has amnesia? So the bugs have caused everybody to have funny problems with their memory? If that's true, I better find the Keyhole quickly and make this world okay. Huh? Where's that? What's an Inkling? Hey, wait! Don't go! I'll be back in a sec! Could this be an Inkling? "Alice." I wonder if that's her name. Maybe it's...Alice? Hey, that's great! Your memory's back! So that Keyhole, do you have any idea where you might have seen it? That's right! Do you know where? Okay... So if I keep on giving her Inklings, she'll eventually remember where she saw the Keyhole. But where can I find more Inklings? Okay. Alice, I'll be back with more stuff to help you remember. Just stay right here. Would you tell me what you want!?

Sora, it's Mickey. Do you read me? I wish I knew, Sora, but I can't figure out what's happening. It's all a really big mystery. The only thing I can think of is that maybe when you defeated the enemy in the Keyhole, you were sent someplace else. I saw a message that said, "Undo the hurt to unbar the way." That might mean that mending the hurt in one world is the key to opening up a road to the next world. I think you're right, Sora. And if this world's like the others, in order to fix it you'll have to find the Keyhole, and defeat whatever enemy is hiding inside. That's great, Sora. Thanks!

Please, help! Thank goodness. Yes! Thank you, oh, um...have we met? Well, I'm… Oh! I really don't know why, but I can't remember! I think I... If you're looking for a Keyhole, I believe I saw one somewhere. Hmm. I just can't remember. What was my name? Oh, if I could only...Yes, of course! Of course, my name is Alice! Well, let me think for a moment. If I recall correctly, it had a sort of glow. Ooh. I'm afraid I'm still ever so foggy. Yes.

Her mind is oh so fuzzy much like me. Not only her, but everyone here as well. Things have become quite buggy, can't you tell? What could she remember when her memory's dismembered? Perhaps an Inkling could help get her thinkling? An Inkling is for you to figure out. If you find one, this will be forgotten. Or is it that it will be remembered? The fog that's bogging could be unclogging with just a smidgen of memory jogging. Perhaps one way, or another way, or in-between ways. One never knows...
That's right. Sort it out and end the hurt. Our world still aches...and your next road still awaits.

Inklings.Line: They're Inklings? In the reports, do you happen to remember what it was that they called Naminé? Yes, that's right. All the strange occurrences taking place in these worlds, are about the first journal, in which "Thank Naminé" was written. But as far as I can tell, the second journal seems to be just fine. Well, I can't be absolutely certain, but I have a feeling that that may be what's going on.
Does that word ring some kinda bell for ya, Jiminy? A witch who changes memories. Are you thinkin' Naminé may have something to do with it? Hmm. Guess we better wait and see what happens.
Gawrsh, is that your second journal, Jiminy?

Memories Regained.Line: Hey, Alice. I'm back. Of course! That's great! You remember everything, don't you? Yeah! Let's go!

I hope you're here to help me remember what I've forgotten. I remember! Let's see, I was in a field of flowers, when I saw a rabbit in a waistcoat. He seemed to be in an awful hurry. I chased him into a burrow, and fell down a very peculiar hole. That's how I ended up here. And then, when I asked the Cheshire Cat how to get home, he suggested I visit the Queen of Hearts in her castle... That's it! The Queen's castle is where I saw the Keyhole! Yes, and it's all because of you. Thank you. Sora, would you like me to show you the way to the castle?
The truth lies through the Keyhole. And with it, true memories.

The Queen of Hearts.Line: And who are you? Stop there! All of the ways here are my ways! Only I decide who gets to look around or asquare. Hmm... Not likely! Silence! I demand you stand trial this instant! A lie if I've ever heard one! More proof that you're the thieves who made off with my memory! Hmm... So that's how you did it, is that it? You and an army of insects! There certainly is! I say you're guilty! That's the verdict! Guards! Off with their heads! Don't let him get away! After him!

Please excuse us, Your Majesty. We just need to look around. Yes, I'm sorry. We're just in quite a hurry. Please, Your Majesty! We haven't done anything wrong! Your Majesty! There's no evidence! Oh, no! Sora, we must go! Umm… It's there! Inside that bird cage! Sora, where are you going? Oh, but...If you say so, but don't let the guards catch you!

Huh!? Come on, it wasn't our fault! It was the bugs! Alice, do you remember where you saw it? Is the Keyhole here? Got it! Thanks! I have to try and find a way to get to that Keyhole. You should escape while you can! Don't worry, I'll be fine!

Beneath the Hood.Line: That's good. Looks like Sora got another world repaired. "Undo the hurt to unbar the way." I guess there are other worlds in the journal that are still gonna need our help. Sora! Hurry! You gotta go after him. It's clear he knows something! Don't worry. Sora will catch him. Then we'll know for sure. You're here!? Riku!? Datascape? We're in the journal? Chip? Dale? Then we really are inside the datascape, just like Riku said. Maybe you can tell us---is there any way for us to get back home? Chip? Dale! Sora. That's another one we owe ya.

It's happened just like we thought! Another line's showin' up in my journal! "There are more hurts than the one you have just undone." I wonder how Sora is doing. Your Majesty, do you think he's opened up a path to another world? Look! It's him! How're we gonna find out who he is? Huh? Majesty! There, on the monitor! You're my journal?
Uh-oh...What if he's Organization XIII? Who's there? Riku!? Huh? "Imported"? Where? Aww... How 'bout some good news? You will?
Gawrsh, that must mean the door's still locked. Chip and Dale musta come back to rescue us! Riku!? Huh? Well, if Sora's here with us, and Chip and Dale are out there lookin' in, then...That's swell!

Got you now! Tell me! Are you the one behind these glitches? Hey! Hold it! That voice... Mickey? Is that you? I was just...following that guy, and...Riku!? I don't understand it all, but...basically, this means you guys can't go home, right? Okay. Then I'll go bash the bugs for you. Who says we're keeping score? We're all friends, right? Right. See you.

This world has been connected. Memory and reality now stand tied. It's time for you to learn the truth. Sorry. Not quite. Much like Sora there, I'm just zeroes and ones that look like somebody you know. Memories used to fill Jiminy's journal---but when they were pulled apart and then stitched back together, bugs appeared. It was these bugs that kept the book from being completely restored. Of all the possible vessels to protect the data, I was chosen from the journal's pages. The full set of memories was transferred inside of me to shield them from corruption. So, in a way...what I really am is Jiminy's journal. I took the liberty of importing all of you to help solve the mystery of this entry. You really haven't noticed? All right...A hacker! If that's true, then there won't be any way out for you. No luck. The link from here to the real world has been totally cut. If we repair that link, a new pathway should open. Of course, that's if these bugs weren't around.
Your Majesty! Your Majesty! The room was empty when we came back, and we've been searching the data for you ever since! Someone's trying to break into the data from the outside!
If you can hear us, please say something! We finally got through! Oh no! You have to escape before—

Scoping Out the Area.Line: Sora, how do things look over there? Don't be so sure. One of the bugs interfering with the link is definitely in Olympus Coliseum. First, you're gonna have to find the Keyhole where it resides. Then, if my findings are right, that'll take you to the world's core. If you can get rid of whatever's harming the core, the bugs will disappear. It's as easy as that. Thanks. Be careful.

That voice... Riku? (looking around) I don't know, there's not much going on here. So it's just like those other worlds---the enemy is inside the Keyhole. All right! I can get rid of them! Once that's done, I'll find a way back outside for all of you.

The King's Chronicles; Olympus Coliseum.Line: Your search for that world's Keyhole brought you to the lobby of the Coliseum where you met Phil. Hercules had gone off to investigate the cause of the bugs and hadn't returned. When you finally found him in the Coliseum labyrinth, Herc told you that Hades was the one responsible for the whole mess in Olympus. Knowing you had to stop the evil Hades, you and Herc headed further into the depths of the maze, ready to face whatever danger may lurk ahead.

I'm No Friend of Heroes.Line: Are you Hercules, the hero? To you...a problem. Now show me that you've got a real good reason to fight. Ready for this? So everything he said about you is true. My name's Cloud. No friend of heroes. Hades, stay out of this! I told you this is my fight! What's that? Get back here! So he was just using me the whole time. Gotta go.

Who're you? Hey, what did we ever do to you? Are you the one who did this to the Coliseum? Nice guy. What's his problem? That doesn't explain why his attitude stinks. We have to do something about this. Otherwise, we're never gonna get out of here.

Here ya go! Tell me your name. Then who did? Hey, wait a sec. I guess he's just another victim of Hades' schemes. Whoa, whoa. So if it's not Hades, who could it be? Not sure I even know where to start. Guess we go back to the beginning, then. Come on, you can follow me.

Seriously? I missed? Oh, please. This stopped being about you ages ago. You couldn't even distract Jerk-ules long enough for me to mangle his moussaka. Help like that, I'll pass. You know, I wish I could take the credit, but this time, you got the wrong guy. Sorry, Wonder Boy, but this maze has another keeper now. But hey, I'm a fair god, no? I'll stay out of your way. I mean, why work when I can just sit back and watch you all wither away? So long, Spike. Go find a bucket and kick it.

The King's Chronicles; Olympus Coliseum.Line: As you and Herc continued through the labyrinth, you found Cloud, surrounded by Heartless. His heart was so full of despair that at first, he chose not to hear what you were saying. But soon, the two of you found a way to reach him and Cloud decided to help out. Together, the three of you headed further into the maze.

The Definition of a Hero.Line: Finally. It's about time I found my way home. Yeah, tell us, Sora. Hero, huh?

I'm really glad to hear that! I have a theory. Hey, Herc, I think I know now how you make it as a hero. Something like- if you find yourself in trouble, make sure you're the one still standing at the end! You gotta tell me! How'd you do that? Yeah!

Hey there. Think you might be forgetting a few loose ends? Like me. I finally find a trap with all the right trappings, and what do you do? You go and ruin it. Ya see, here's the thing about deadly mazes- You're supposed to DIE in them. But I guess this is gonna take a more personal approach! Care to prove that theory!? Heh heh! I'll give you this round, but not the match. What can I say? I'm immortal.
Hades! Let's hear it. Hero! That's the job. The Coliseum should be safe now. C'mon, we better go find Phil. He's probably pretty worried.

A Shady Character.Line: Mickey, did that do it? Who are you? Right.
Yup. Sora, thank you. Huh? No way! Pete's here? How'd you get in? He must be up to something. Quick! After him!
Hey, wait. This time, we didn't get a video. Huh?

Right. Those scenes---they originated inside my mind. When you got rid of the bugs, you gave me deeper access to the memories associated with those worlds. The things I saw must have found their way back through the link and shown up on your monitor.
Well, whaddaya know. If those memories came from deep within the journal itself, then it's really no wonder they're unfamiliar. They don't belong to any of us!
Playin' dumb, eh? Same way as youse did. Thought I'd take a little vacay from the outside world. Well, this here world belongs to me, see, so mitts off!

A Ghost Town.Line: Where is he? If Mickey's concerned about him, then that must mean he's up to no good. Why's it so quiet? I thought this place would be busier. It's like a ghost town. What happened here?

The King's Chronicles; Agrabah I.Line: Despite the bugs and Heartless, you met a friend, Aladdin. You joined him to find Princess Jasmine. Working together, you saved her from Jafar. That's when you discovered Jafar's nefarious plan to take over the throne and become ruler of all of Agrabah. Thanks to that no-good Pete, Jafar managed to get a replica of the magic lamp. Using it to stop time, he kidnapped Jasmine and disappeared. But, thankfully, the magic didn't affect you, Sora. Your power protected you from the time-stopping spell. In order to stop Jafar and his evil plan, Aladdin had gotten ahold of the real magic lamp. But his victory didn't last long. That sneaky Iago swooped in and stole it. The chase was on!

Genie.Line: Where do you think you're going? Nowhere with that lamp. Better not catch you bothering my friends again, Iago! I don't get it. Why did Aladdin have this old thing anyway? Unless, maybe it's the treasure that he found in the Cave of Wonders. Wh-what's happening!? Huh? My friends call me Sora. "Al" as in "Aladdin"? Aladdin---he can't move 'cause Jafar stopped time so he's kinda stuck. Uh, who are you? Are you for real? I have tons of wishes! Hmm. I wish...for you to make the world what it was before! You did it. Thanks! So that means time unfroze for Aladdin and everyone else, right? Awww, no way! No, it's my fault. I should have been a lot more careful when I worded my wish. How else will I find him? And I do need help. All right, Genie, I know what I want for my next wish- I wish for you to take me to the villain!
Let me go, it's not my fault! Jafar made me do it! Blame him! Phew! So long! See ya later...

So, you got troubles? Well, you've come to the right--- Hey, wait. You're not Al. Name's Genie "of the lamp." How ya doin'? Just make a wish, and all your problems will be solved! Magic at your service, all day, twenty-four-seven and three-sixty-five. That's right! I'm all yours! Hold on kid. Got a few rules, the limit's three! Can't expect other people to take care of every little thing for ya, am I right? Hey, what's with the face, kid? Easy! Are you ready? Watch this! Check it out! Whaddaya think of your new, totally phantom-free city, master? Ooh! Sorry. Little problem. Only the one who cast it can undo that kind of spell. I'm sorry, kid, it's one of the iron-clad rules. No interpretation. I have to do exactly what you say. No, no! Don't say that! I didn't tell you about all the rules. I just let you start making wishes with no guidance. Okay, that one's a freebie! And wait---there's more! I just happen to have a trace on a certain super-creepy bad guy that you've been looking for. Whaddaya say? How 'bout another chance? Woohoo! Your wish is my command, little man! Buckle up, here we go!

Questions and More Questions.Line: A-hyuck. That Genie sure is funny.
I can't wait to see Jasmine and Aladdin. Wait. We just need to let Sora figure this out.
But where do ya think...Pete decided to go to? But Jiminy, the only journals are right here. Yes. But I'm still gonna worry about Pete. We gotta come up with a plan, in case something happens.

And how did he get in there? Pete shouldn't even exist in the datascape, from everything I can tell. Hmm. We know he didn't have access to this device, so that must prove there's another way for somebody to get inside the datascape.
He must have found a way to infiltrate the world. I just don't know how. I have just what we need. I know what the plan is.

The King's Chronicles; Agrabah II.Line: With help from the Genie, you avoided Jafar's traps and headed into the Cave of Wonders where Jasmine slept under a spell. You cornered the vizier in the Lamp Chamber... But he had the upper hand; he still possessed the replica of the magic lamp. Making his final wish, Jafar transformed himself into a genie. Then, using his new powers, he disappeared inside the Keyhole.

My Last Wish.Line: Oh, I see you are no ordinary street rat. Not if you could elude my ingenious traps. Impressive. But your persistence, it has won you nothing. Do you not see I am invincible? Nothing you can do can defeat me! Stand still, you bothersome brat. It's over! It's time you bow to me! Give me the lamp, child! It belongs to me! No! No!

I don't stand a chance. What do I do? Genie! The lamp. Roger that, Genie! Over and out! Hear that, Jafar? It's time for you to go home! Is that it? Is it over? Pete! I found you! Hey, where you going!? Yeah, it's time for me to go. I wish you to help Jasmine home and give the lamp back to Aladdin. I want my last wish to go to Aladdin. If he hadn't found the magic lamp, we never would have met and become such good friends. On top of that, I know here, he'll use it for you, for something good that's sure to make you happy. Good-bye, Genie! Thanks for your help with everything. You're the best, too!

Genie to Sora. Sora, do you read me? He's not kidding about the invincible part. None of your attacks can hurt him. But, Jafar's a genie now, and like it or not, every genie has a cage. Hurry, Sora! Use the lamp! You can trap Jafar inside it! Whoa! Sora. You leaving already? Consider it done! That's wish number two. And what's on the menu for numero tres? What? Sora...You're the best! Talk about a friend! I'll tell Al that's how ya feel. Catch you later, Sora!
No, not you again! I can't take much more of this! Okay, okay, I give up! Promise! Pinky swear, I'll never do it again! I gotta find a new line of work.
This just ain't fair! Jafar was supposed to help me cast this whole world into darkness!

Maleficent's Designs.Line: There you are, Pete! You're not getting away this time! Huh? Who's that? Grr...Aah! Riku! Mickey! It was you! You're the one who cut the link! Riku! He's gone...

That is where you're wrong, you little pip-squeak. I think it's time to show you who's the real boss. Come on out, Maleficent. But since you're wonderin', it was all my idea, you bozo. We caught wind right away you was up to somethin', see. So, I decided to pay ya a little visit on Maleficent's orders. And what do I find? And that's how yours truly got sucked into the light show. I woke up all by my lonesome in the weirdest place. Oh! Maleficent! You seein' this? Better get here right away! I ain't no expert, but I think it's hookin' a bunch of places together. Could come in handy for takin' over them worlds, huh? And there ya have it. Me and Maleficent been diggin' around in here ever since. Lucky for us, this world connects right to that there shiny castle o' yours, Mickey. Oh, right, I mean it used to. But that was before I took control of the only way out, making sure you guys is stuck here forever. Looks like it's game over. And you suckers are just a bunch o' losers!

Must you always be so exasperating, my dear child? Do you require a reminder of my power? Hmm? Isn't that odd? So we see, 'twas but a lie. And now that it's gone, this entire world shall be mine to rule. Yes, my loyal minions. Drag all that you see into deepest darkness! "Date escape"? Spare me your dull details. You'll take no such tone with me. What is this place? It does seem...for once you may have done something right. Of what consequence is that now? Both worlds shall be mine quite soon. Then, when I have immersed this world in darkness, I shall send my Heartless horde back into your little castle under my command! The long slumber ends, and very, very soon, all the worlds will belong to me! Just one thing- my worlds must be free of light, and yours are far too bright. It is time for all of you to fall under my spell into a deep sleep! Hmph! You fool! Don't you know he belongs to the darkness? That means he is destined to be consumed by it like the rest of us. This boy is under my control now. I have great hope that he will prove to be more than useful.
You okay? You're wrong. This is one world you won't touch!
Maleficent. What are you doing here in the datascape? Hmm? What's that bright light? That'll never happen. Riku!

Where's My Keyblade?.Line: Why, this is terrible! They can't just go and take Riku away! Well it...looks like it's only one. That sure is a shame. We were so close to bein' done. Your Majesty! That's dangerous! He's gonna have to deal with whatever Maleficent and Pete are up to. Strange. He was here a moment ago.

And another thing, doesn't Riku have all the journal data inside of him? Of course he is! After all, King Mickey's brave and strong. And with the bugs... Maybe we should be gettin' worried, huh? Ohhh, you don't think...

That's true! The datascape is going to be cast into darkness! I sure hope the King is okay. Yeah, I know, but he's going up against more than just the Heartless. Well, the King said to stay here. What do you think we should do? Sora?

Then, Jiminy... How many of the worlds still have bugs left in 'em? It's not your fault, Sora. Don't worry---I'll take care of everything, I promise. I know I can find another way to get rid of the bugs and rescue Riku, too! Sora, I'm sorry, but your Keyblade was completely destroyed by Maleficent. Thing is, about that Keyblade, it was just an object that we programmed into the datascape from the outside world. There's nothing we can do in here, but once we're all back at the real castle, we might be able to rewrite the data and make a new one. Except...one problem. Maleficent is blocking the path out of here. Until we can find a way back, you'll just have to do without one. Don't you worry. Now it's time for me to show you what I can do. You guys, hold down the fort.

Getting all the bugs would've meant finding a way back home for all of you. Guys, I'm sorry. I really blew it this time. Sounds good! Count me in! Hm? That's weird. My Keyblade isn't working. No way! But how? Huh? But, what will I...?

The Chase Is On.Line: My Keyblade's gone, but I'm still gonna help. I know I can save Riku. Pete! Start talking! Where are you keeping Riku? Hey! Come back here!

Wha---? Where'd that voice come from? Huh? Oh, wait, I know you. You're that annoyin' pip-squeak! Just what in the blazes are you doin' here? Well, if you wanna find your palie, you're gonna hafta catch me first! So long!

Rescued!.Line: Show yourself! Pete! Oh, no! I'm trapped! I can wipe that smug look off your face! Wait! This would be nothing, if only I had my Keyblade...No, I can do this on my own! Goofy! Yeah... I understand. Sorry. ...Okay. Huh? We're not going back? Chase after Pete? You sure? Goofy... Thank you! No. You mean he came with you? I hope he's okay. Come on, let's go look for him first.

Well, ain't you a pointy-haired doofus, comin' in here when there ain't nothin' you can do! Ha! You can't touch me. Come on out! Heartless! Now you guys all play nice whilst I finish settin' up our little puppet show. Have fun with your new best friends!

Here I come, Sora! Heartless, be gone! Gawrsh, Sora. How come you came to this place? The King wanted us all to stay together back in the library. You shouldn'ta run off on your own like that. Good. That means we can go. A-hyuck! It's this way, silly. I thought we were chasin' after Pete. C'mon. We gotta hurry and catch up. Of course! It's like you always tell us- "When you're friends, you do whatever you can to help each other." By the way, have you seen Donald anywhere? We were lookin' for ya together. We musta got split up somewhere.

You Have Us.Line: Donald! But I thought YOU were the one who went missing, Donald. Donald, sorry. It's because my Keyblade got destroyed that we all ended up here in this place. I dragged you into a real mess. Huh? You like it? But why? Thanks, Donald. You too, Goofy. Hey, guys? I just want to say, "Thank you." When I'm with the two of you, I feel like I can do anything. It's kinda like, we've done this before. There's no memory of it, but it still feels like it happened. Okay, let's go!

So that's where ya went! You mean us? Actually, we kinda like gettin' dragged into your messes. You don't need a Keyblade, Sora, when you have us with ya! Why are you sayin' that now, Sora? It's kinda fun to make the same friend twice, and a little excitin'! Yeah. We still have to catch Pete, and then figure out a way to rescue Riku!

Sora! Goofy! Hey! What's the big idea!? This is no time to go missing! The details don't matter! I was worried sick about you two! What are you talking about? You don't need to apologize to us. Because it's no fun watching from the other side of the screen. We wanted to go on an adventure with you like old times. Then that means the three of us are true friends just like I always knew! But now, it's time for us to get back to business.

My Friends Are My Power.Line: We got you, Pete. Stop! Donald! Goofy! What do I do now? Donald...My friends are my power...Donald! Goofy! Please! Just stop! Let 'em go! Huh? What just happened? Is it...the Keyblade? Huh? Mickey! But what did I do? What was inside of me that changed? A power that's just mine...No way! Not so fast! Give us Riku! Right now! Huh? What now? Wait. I need to do this on my own. Up till now, all of you helped me. That's the reason I made it this far. But, guys, it's my turn now. I have the Keyblade again; I'm going to help you find a way back. Huh? Well, maybe just a little...Got it. I'll come back safe and sound. I promise you that.

Oh? Hey, hey, hey, hey, whoa! Grr! Couldn't get nothin' done by yourself, so you went cryin' to your doofus pals. Well, too bad! Ain't gonna do ya a lick of good, see! And that's not all! Why the blazes would you chumps risk your necks for a lump of data? Why, he's a phony. You guys made him and that Keyblade of his! He's not even real! Ha! Some friend! He ain't nothin' more than an empty shell. The kid doesn't even have a heart. What a load of bunk! Oh, enough with the mush already! You mugs are done, see! And I bet all that power can't protect ya now! Time to say goodnight! How'd you get that? Seriously, Maleficent crushed that thing like it was a bug! Conjurin' up a new Keyblade just ain't fair! Maybe it's time for me to make a strategical retreat...Huh? I've about had it with the lot of you. Now get outta my way! Ha ha! Sayonaree! See ya later! Yow!

Heartless! Look out! We're a sandwich! That's not true! We've all got Sora's heart right here inside us! And me and Donald, we're always gonna fight for him, too. That's because he's in our hearts as much as we're inside of his. Somethin' else---and I can say this for sure---Sora is our friend, and that makes him our power. Let's say it together- My friends are my power! But look! It's a Keyhole! It's not like we can stop you, right, Sora?

Wak! Lemme at 'em! Sora! Wah! We've been trapped! Oh, why don't you be quiet! Sora's our friend no matter what! You'd see it if you paid attention. Why would Sora keep fighting for us---no matter how hard things got for him---if he didn't care about us? Let's say it together- My friends are my power! Let's go! Huh? But why? Is that the reason? Or do you just want to try your new power, Sora?

Sora. It looks to me like something inside of you has been changed somehow. I can't say what it is for sure, but I think a new part of you has been awakened. The Keyblade's power comes from the wielder's strength of heart. Once, an old friend said to me, "A heart is so much more than any system." The Keyblade we gave you before was one we created---it was nothing but data. To tell ya the truth, I never expected it to have the same kinda power as the real Keyblade. That weapon was just a replica; it didn't have any substance. That's why Maleficent could destroy it so easily. But, during your journey, you really made a connection with all of us. You've become more than the system, Sora. The power you found inside of you isn't like anybody else's. And when you accessed that power, that's what brought your Keyblade back. Well, that's what I believe anyway. Only you had the power to do it. Yep, I think that's right. I've been searching all over, trying to find a way to fix the leftover bugs, but everything looks like it's okay. Oh, no! He's gone! Just remember, you're never alone. When you get hurt, it hurts us too. Sora, you're always a part of our team.

Can't You Hear Me?.Line: Pete! It's the end of the road! No! And you're comin' with me. You give up yet? Riku! Riku! What happened? Stop! Riku! Talk to me! Mickey! It's Riku. They put bugs in him! Riku! Please... Can't you hear what we're saying to you? What?

Don't you know when to quit? Ha! I'm done with you ruinin' all my plans! Get ready. 'Cause I got a brand-new plan for ya! Not this again...Well, I still got an ace up my sleeve. Come on out and say hello! Glad you asked! I went and took the liberty of takin' away his liberty. Data stuff like this sure is useful. Alls I had to do was load some of those bug thingies into your palie's data-matronics. Now, let's see what this minion can do. I order you to attack! No? Okay then. What if I add a little more juice? Welp, that oughta keep ya for awhile. Heh heh heh heh! So long! I'll just leave you two to get reacquainted.
Sora, stay back! I will never...answer to you! Destroy me...
I heard a scream. Sora, tell me what's going on! What? Riku! Can you hear my voice? Riku!

What Friends Are For.Line: Huh? Is he...? Do you think...? Riku... So if I debug him, Riku will come back to us. Guys, I gotta go inside to look. I know it's risky, but if a friend needs me to be there, I'll be there---to help! Thanks, guys.

Well, if the bugs have taken over Riku...then that means...He might not ever wake up unless we get rid of the bugs first. Huh? Sora, don't forget---you're not goin' in there alone. Your friends'll be right there fighting alongside ya in spirit, no matter where ya go.
But what about you!? Still can't talk you out of it, huh?
Who's to say if it's even safe inside Riku? A-hyuck! But we'll do everything we can to help you out!
Well, I guess that's Sora for ya.

Riku's Datascape.Line: It sure is empty. Is this really the inside of Riku's datascape? Riku! Are you okay? What is it? So this someone... Was this the same person who filled you with the journal's data? But wait, what will happen to you? Riku... I get it. There's still just enough time. Great! Since there's escape time, that means there's enough time to stop the bugs and help you, right? Come on, this is me here. You didn't really think I'd just give up and leave you like this. That's right! Now tell me how to save you. Huh? Okay. Be right back!

You shouldn't be here, Sora. I can fight the bugs off a little longer...but they're spreading and in just a bit of time, they'll take over all my data. And they won't stop there. They're going to dominate the entirety of the datascape, and that includes you, too. You won't be able to last long. Here, take this, and escape while you can. It's data that isn't supposed to be inside Jiminy's journal. Someone added it after the fact. I don't know for sure. It's up to you now to find out. You've gotta figure out who it is. Because of you, all the bugs outside are gone. If you can just solve the mystery of this extra data, then the journal will be completely restored. It'll also give the others a way back home. I'll dive into the darkness, and take the bugs with me so they're destroyed. They'll never see the light again. This will all be over. Go. While I can still control this. I won't be able to hold them off much longer. Hurry, Sora. If you leave now, you can make it out. I don't want to hurt you. You have to go. Right. What? I didn't mean that! Sora... Huh... I remember now. Once you get an idea in your head...See that door? It should lead deeper into my data... Inside, you'll find a vast world created from my memories. Once you've gotten rid of the bugs in one world, another world should open before you. Bugs are everywhere, Sora. Be careful.

The Other Destiny Islands.Line: Riku! It has. Hey, do you remember when you left me that Keyhole here before? I didn't know I'd have to face such a big monster. Did you know what was inside? Mickey said there was a mysterious message added to the journal, right? After all this, we haven't figured it out. As long as our friends get back safely, it'll be fine.

Thanks to you, I can access this world, now that you've weakened the bugs here. It's been a while. Yeah. You needed a chance to prove yourself with the Keyblade. You also needed to learn how everything works in the datascape. Sorry about that. I didn't have time to show you the ropes. Inside the journal, the Heartless had already shattered the walls between worlds, and soon more and more things were breaking down. The bugs were attacking the wall between the datascape and the real world. I had to weigh all the options. I decided to use the damage to my advantage and call Mickey and the others here to help. I know I put everyone in danger, but I had no choice. I think dragging everybody into this was wrong. We should go.

The Other Traverse Town.Line: Hey there. Looks like you've taken care of the bugs here, too. Sora, I owe you. Last time I was here, it was to keep some kids safe from danger. Yeah. They were targets because they had pieces of the Keyhole. I knew somebody had to look out for them, so I decided to do it. I'm sorry. You still needed to toughen up a little bit more on your own. You had a rough job, and if you couldn't do it, then... Well, I guess my only option would've been to handle it on my own. Sora...I'm sorry, you're right.

Riku! Do you mean Huey, Dewey, and Louie? But Riku, why didn't you let me know what was going on when we met? Riku... You know what? You gotta stop doing everything by yourself. "I LIKE getting dragged into your messes." Donald and Goofy said that. Friends want to help you out whenever they can. Forget that "on my own" talk. And stop with all the apologizing. C'mon! We've got things to do!

The Other Wonderland.Line: Sora, I'm sorry. Can you blame me? I should never have let the bugs in like this. Every time it's me against an outside force, I always seem to give in. Hmm? ...Incredible. Sora...Hmph. Yeah well, you're still kind of a half-pint. I look forward to the day THAT happens. ...Hey, Sora. Never mind. I'll tell you when it's all over.

Come on, stop saying that! Hey, Riku. Question- How many worlds have we been to now? 'Cause not too long ago, the answer to that question would've been only "one." But now we've been to all kinds of places on tons of adventures. And instead of just sitting around and dreaming about what's out there, we only have to remember it. It's that easy!  We've got the whole universe inside; there are worlds inside us. Try and let that sink in. I don't know much, but that's amazing! But you know, no matter the world, no matter how far, you're always the same. You're right. There may still be outside forces trying to pull you in, but I know you're not going to lose. Everything you touch makes you stronger. It always has. Ha ha! Sounded good, right? You're not the only one who's grown through all this! Hey! Don't think I'm not gonna remember that when I'm taller than you! Yeah? Okay. I'll see you on the other side!

The Other Agrabah.Line: Remember this? It was right around here that I came to save you. I'd gotten a bad feeling, and Mickey knew something was up. How's that? Heh. I kind of envy you. You've got a simple world. I envy whatever makes you think it could be. Come on, let's head back.

Yeah. This is where Maleficent ambushed me. I thought I was a goner! I'm glad you came when you did. That's when I lost the power of the Keyblade. You see? Things will work out! No matter what you lose, you can always get it back. And that means YOU can definitely get yourself back! Is that...a good thing? Gee, thanks a lot! Hey, wait up!

The Enemy Within.Line: Enough hurt's been undone for you to access the innermost reaches of my data. But remember, in there lies the source of all sources. We don't know the bug's true form or origin...or why it's even here. Yes. Everything should be like it was before. You don't have to thank me. What do you mean? The first time I saw you was on our island. Keep focus. Are you ready for this fight? I'm afraid I have to stay out here, but I will leave you with this- No matter what's in there now, don't hold back.

So if we take it out, we'll solve the last of the datascape's problems. Thanks for everything. I feel like after going through all your memories, now, the journey's made me that much stronger. Sure I do! There's no way I would've made it this far without your help, Riku. Plus, you were even there when I woke up. Remember when I first got my hands on the Keyblade? You were there from the start. Wha---? But, I was sure I saw you there in your black coat. Huh. That's strange. Huh? Oh, yeah...Riku, how did---!? Wait, no. You're not him. You can't be Riku. The bugs must've absorbed his power and taken this form. Now I see why he felt he had to warn me about you. Here goes! That should've cleared all the bugs inside him. It's time to head home.

See You on the Other Side.Line: Nicely done! Did that bug try to use my power for itself? Just a feeling. I thought it might try to exploit the darkness that's been lurking inside of me. I've been envious of what you have. Always surrounded by friends, who trust you completely---My friends? Guess you're right. No way! Hurry, Sora! You've got to escape! Someone's trying to close the road back to the outside world. Go now, or you'll be trapped inside here. That should get you out of here. Sora, thanks again. I'll see you on the other side.

Riku, thanks. Yep, but how'd you know that? Stop right there. First off, I trust you. Second, my friends are your friends, too. Ask! Let's go, Riku. Everybody's waiting for us! What---? What's that?  Uh, o-okay! Yeah, I'll hold you to that!
Of course we're your friends, Riku! Hey, Sora, are you guys okay in there?
Take out some bugs for me, would ya?
Yeah, and just give a holler if ya need help! We'll be here!

Back to the Real World.Line: Sora! Gawrsh, you made it back! Great idea! And next time, we can bring everybody!
Yay! You're here! Yeah! That sounds like fun!

Welcome back, Sora. Good, you look like you're okay. Actually, we saw it all. You got rid of the last of the bugs from the datascape. We really owe ya! So this is it. Time for us to leave. And time to say bye to the datascape. Thank you, Riku. Good-bye! You two take care, okay?

Mickey! It's good to be here! You guys, listen. You'd never believe the stuff I saw! Yep. Happy I could help. Oh, hey! Riku! Is Riku all right? Riku! Yeah! You can always come back another time! Yep, see ya!

I'm just fine. Sorry to put you through all that. Looks like we managed to keep that promise. I wish we had some time to sit around and catch up, but these guys need to hurry. Go there. As promised, that's your road home to the real world where everyone's waiting for you. Actually...there's something important I haven't told you yet. It's just... No. It can wait until you've made it through. Heh.
It's not everyday that I get to explore my journal's world. Now that the moment's here, I'm kinda sad we hafta go.

To the Rescue.Line: Did we...? Loud and clear, Riku! We're here because of you. Thank you. Sora? But, then we're gonna lose you and Sora, AND what was in the journal! We'll lose it all! Even if I've never been their biggest fan, they're not made of data. We have gotta find a way to save them! Huh?
Yahoo! We have been waiting for you!
Chip and Dale are here, so I think that means… Huh? Whaddaya mean by that? That makes me sad. Aww... What do we do now?

We're really here! Hooray! We did it! Does that mean...you're gonna forget about the time we were together? Even all the stuff that we're talkin' about right now? Not fair. Sora...Bugs!? But how could that happen? I thought we got rid of all of 'em!

It's true! We're finally home! Our castle in the real world. Yes, it should return to how it was, when I first wrote everything down. Without all those pesky bugs, the journal entries should appear back in their original state. You went through so much. You really helped us in the datascape. Taking all that away is such a...What's that? That's not the only problem! Both Maleficent and Pete are still inside the datascape, too! We can't let them be deleted, can we?

Can you guys hear me? Glad to see you made it back safely. Well, guess Sora and I are done for now. It's all over now that we figured out how to get rid of the bugs. The journal will go back to the way it was. Is that right, Jiminy? Right. The entries will reappear as they were before. And all of the rest...has to be reset. That means, the whole adventure we all shared... It'll be swept from our memories like it never happened. We're nothing but data. That's just the way it goes. What is this power? It's so much stronger than anything I've ever felt before! Could it be some sort of bug? I thought we did too. There's a chance we were wrong. That message said it was going to delete the datascape. We can't let something that powerful get loose. The journal data has to be locked! Then locking the data isn't an option? Both worlds are at stake! What do we do? Sora? Where are you going? Hey! Sora, are you crazy!? But you don't even know where they are! Aren't you afraid? All our memories, our entire existence, even this whole world could get erased! Huh?

Heh. Mickey, still there? Riku explained things. I know it's not what we all would want, but guys, if that's the way everything's meant to be then...Thank you. But actually, I'm okay with it. Besides, you won't be able to get rid of us that easily. Me and Riku, we aren't going anywhere. We might lose some memories, but that doesn't matter when we've still got you guys. Our adventure may not be found in the journal, but you'll always find us in your hearts. No matter what happens, we'll be right here. As long as you remember us, and everything that we've been through together... Well then, who knows? Heh. Well, we should sign off here. I guess it's good-bye, guys. Give the "us" out there our best, okay? Oh, no... You guys, hang tight! I'll take care of this. No way I'm gonna leave them out there! You heard what Mickey said. I gotta find Pete and Maleficent! Then I'll just have to go look for them! I'm afraid. Why wouldn't I be? But, you know why I have to do this. You've been in my shoes before. You've fought with no one beside you. Because you knew that was a lot less scary than just sitting around and Waiting by yourself for the end to come. Riku, you once said- "What's important are the actions that you take." I don't know if there's any way that we can win, but I know...I've gotta at least try.

The Light Is Inside You.Line: 'Scuse me there, Maleficent, but do you really think we're gettin' anywhere with this colossus? Yeah, but, uh, Maleficent, I think the pip-squeak here may have a point. Huh!?
Hmph! No matter. Any less of an opponent would be an insult. Do you actually think I'll take orders from one such as you? Silence, coward! You will do as I—What!?

It's him! I fought this thing on the island. But I thought it got swept away into the darkness along with everything else... Listen to me! You two need to get outta here! Pete! Maleficent! Unbelievable... This guy's a lot stronger than what I fought before! No way is this the same guy! It feeds on the glitches? Riku, you wanna fill me in? My Heartless!? And you think my Heartless is responsible for that? But Riku, we put all the data back! That must've at least weakened it, right? I can still stop it, can't I? I did all that? But then where did the minds end up? Where could they have gone? If something this powerful got into Mickey's world... Oh no! I have to protect them. I'll use the strength they've given me! Is it over? Wait! How is this possible? It's changing...No, it's evolving! Mickey! How---?
Rage... Hatred... And now, glitches to feed my darkness. Rage... Hatred... Glitches to feed my darkness... And soon, hearts to sate my hunger!

Wait, that's it! Sora, you're not the only one who changed, who evolved within the datascape! Yes, but listen to me carefully. I know where the bugs came from. All of them! It's your shadow. It's your Heartless, Sora! You once turned into a Heartless, though you may not remember. It was recorded into the journal along with everything else, then it vanished. Your memories disappeared too, but you managed to get those back. For some reason, though, the pages of the journal---they stayed blank. It makes sense. Everything in Jiminy's journal revolved around one person, and that person is you, Sora. Without you, there never would have been any entries. This whole time you've been evolving in the datascape, finding new strength, your Heartless has been absorbing data and doing the same. It's grown, Sora. Just like you have. No... I should have realized all of this sooner. Normally, defeating a Heartless causes its heart to be released. Then the heart's returned to the person who lost it. But when you defeat Heartless here in the datascape---that wouldn't set any real hearts free. Remember, Sora, hearts can't be turned to data. Instead, I think what you released are probably the Heartless's minds. They're right in front of you! Your Heartless has been gathering, then devouring the dark intentions of all the fallen Heartless. That's where it gets its power. From dark data! And now, just like you, it's become something greater, something much more powerful.

Don't give up, Sora! Anything to help a friend. Don't ya remember what I said? We always help friends. Even when the darkness closes in on ya, all you have to do is look inside. And that's where you'll find your light! Come on, Sora! It's time to do this!

Friends Forever.Line: Pete! Maleficent! You're here! You're all right! It's time to say good-bye. Huh? What gives? Is it a glitch? There's some kind of lump in my throat. Yup! Friends forever, Your Majesty.
I found them caught inside a rift in the data. Well, think I'll keep an eye on them on their way out.
Hmph! We were just fine. You will hear no words of thanks from me, child.
Sayonaree to the one, two, three of ya! I'm out. See you chumps on the other side! By the way, don't think we're lettin' ya off the hook!

Pretty soon, the data will go back to its original form. The way it was before all of those bugs showed up. It's not a glitch. That's just...what good-bye feels like. When we met in the datascape, it brought back a whole bunch of memories. The day I set out on my first big adventure. The day I made a new friend, a special friend. They all came rushing back to me. I knew, that the journal... It's not just a diary. It's a collection---a collection of all we felt. The journal shows what's in our hearts. I promise. We'll tell the other Sora and Riku about what happened here. That way, this journey that we just had will be one everyone shares. The memories will always connect us; they'll be our own special bond. Remember, we're friends forever, Sora.

A Fairy Tale?.Line: It's finally clear. Why that world they called the "date escape" seemed so familiar. A book...known as the ancient Book of Prophecies. It's said to be capable of transcribing events that have yet to take place. Yes, considering legend has it the book can also conjure, making an entire world filled with beings and powers that have yet to exist. Ah, but who's to say a fairy tale's not true? And I ask you, how does that differ from this world they call the "date escape"? Don't you think it might just be worth our while to search for a connection? Perhaps there's a link of some sort between that so-called journal of theirs and the Book of Prophecies. Ours is not a lost cause. First, we must take possession of this "data" of theirs.

What's that? Huh? No kidding! If we got our mitts on somethin' like that, we could finally take over permanent-like! Really!? A book that can just make up a world? I don't know. That sounds like nothin' more than fluffy, pink, kids' fairy tale stuff. It just sounds too good to be true. Hmm? I'd say with that we are onto somethin' huge, eh, Maleficent?

One Last Mystery.Line: Hey, ya know, we never did figure out that mysterious message. What do you mean? When we fixed the data, everything in the journal went back to the way it started, remember?

Guys, big news. A new world has shown up inside the journal. I've found another door leading to extra data. Somebody must have added it once all the other data was restored. Then we should get some answers about this message. I'm fine. My partition isn't affected. But Sora---we can't send him out there when he doesn't know what's going on.

And if we explore that world...Great! Let's ask Sora to---Wait. Hey, Riku. Could you help me get back into the datascape one more time? Sora, this was the day that your journey began. I know, because I was here, too. It's time for the truth. I'm Mickey. I've come here from another kind of world. "Their hurting will be mended when you return to end it." It's a message. And you're the only one with the power to solve the mystery behind it. So we really need your help. You may not remember, but it's clear you still hold the power inside you. Think you'd be willing to lend us a hand? You might help us figure out the truth. Actually, I'm not exactly positive. However, I get the sense it's something important you need to know. Thank you! Let's go. Just follow my lead.
Which means that Sora's journey through the datascape---it never happened to him. Why, now he's just the same boy he was before he ever met any of us.

Hey! Huh? Where am I? How'd I end up in THIS place? And...who are you? Another kind of world? Power? What's that? Whoa! What's THAT? Gosh, I don't have a clue what's going on. I don't, but at the same time...what you're saying feels kind of familiar. So this truth you're talking about, do you think it involves me somehow? If it's information that I'm supposed to know then, well…Okay, Mickey. I'll help.

A Strange Place.Line: Whoa... So you think the truth's hiding somewhere in here? Hey, Mickey? Guess he went ahead. Who are you? Castle Oblivion? Huh? It's a...kind of card. With a picture on it. Wha---? Wait! But how am I supposed to use this? He could've told me that much. And why does he seem so...familiar? Oh!

Me? I'm nobody. In this place, to find is to lose, and to lose is to find. That's the way of things, here in Castle Oblivion. That's right. Here, you will meet people you know. People that you care about. Use that card and press on. You will find the truth that sleeps up ahead.

Hidden Truths.Line: What just happened to me? Jiminy? What did I fix? I don't get it. I don't understand. What is it that I'm supposed to do? Huh? So then...I can do whatever I want to do? Hey, come back! ...He's gone. ...Huh? Wait a sec... Riku? Why are you here? Yeah? What is it? I know you wouldn't ask if it wasn't really important. I'll do it! Wasn't that...Riku? And Kairi? That's right. I was on a journey to find you guys. Something you have in common...I would've helped you, of course. Both of you! I'd've figured out how to undo the hurt. That's a relief. Hey, then what was with the sneak preview? You got it.

That card's special. It will cause you to see people. Well, "illusions" to be exact. They're from Jiminy's journal. It's all of the very same data that you worked so hard to fix. My mistake. Someone must have pressed the reset button on your memory. All you remember is leaving the island. Just the same, you'll remember the folks you meet here. At least, you should. Whatever you want. There's no script to follow. The journal's the closest thing you've got, but that doesn't mean you'll see the things it says. And who really cares? Everything that happens here, and everyone you meet is just an illusion. Yes.

Well, you did it again, Sora. I've got something that you need to see. It'll help you. A hidden truth that's nowhere to be found, even in the deepest corners of your memories. It's something I want you to see. And, something I want you to feel. Thank you, Sora. Now, close your eyes. Darkness had taken a hold of my heart, and Kairi had lost hers completely. But at the end of your journey, you would have saved us, Sora. Think about it. What did Kairi and I have in common? When you watched, what did you feel? It was "hurt." We had both lost ourselves, and we were hurting in a way we'd never hurt before. There's no greater pain in the world... I ask you, Sora- What would you have done? I thought you'd say that. And you're right, you would. Or should I say, you will. I just wanted you to see. You always make the right choices. On the road ahead, more than one truth will come to light. You'll forget things, lose things that you care about, and it won't always make sense. It'll be frustrating, and it'll make you angry. It may even hurt so badly you'll feel like you're about to lose yourself. But don't worry, Sora. That won't happen to you. You won't let it. You're like a sponge. No matter how much pain they throw at you, you'll suck it up, and leave things a little bit better. Just follow your heart, and you can change the lives of not one, but many. You don't have to do anything special. Just do what you do---be yourself. After all, that's what you're good at. Do what feels right to you. Take care, Sora.

The First Question.Line: Well, Sora? How was it? Did you have fun chatting and hanging with the ghosts? Friends? You don't say? So then what were their names again? Tell me. Like I said, everything in this castle is just an illusion. And once the illusions vanish, you'll forget all about your little reunion. Hey, no big deal. The fact that you can't remember them just means they weren't very important to you to begin with. Isn't that right? Hmph. Sure. All of these cards were created from the data in the journal. And all of them will show you more illusions. But from now on, the illusions won't be of your friends. You're fresh off the island, which makes everyone you meet total strangers. Here's a fun little thought. The folks you're about to see? You can fight them all you like. What do you care? They're only strangers. Actually, illusions of strangers. Just a collection of empty bits of data. They won't be able to make the distinction between what's real and what's not. They'll look at the white walls of this castle, and what they'll see are the worlds they call home. Anyway, the truth would be wasted on them, so why bother? They're only there until they're not. Do you see where I'm going with this? Nothing's real. You can break the little hearts they don't have, and then forget about it. No hurt feelings, no baggage. It's that simple. You don't have a heart. It's 100 percent guilt-free. What? You've arrived at the first question.

You shouldn't call them "ghosts." Sure, something was a little off, but I'm certain those three are still my friends. Oh, I don't even have to think---What...? Why can't I...remember? I know them! I'll forget!? That's not true! Of course my friends are always important to me! Okay, maybe I forgot...what just happened, and who I met inside that room. Trust me, I know I'll remember everything again! More cards? Huh? That's what YOU think. It's obvious you know nothing at all. Everything you say is a lie. I might have the strength to hurt someone, but what exactly would be the point? I know...that it would tear me up inside. That ache...would stay with me for a long time. You might not know it now, but I hope you'll see, that nothing is guilt-free in this world. Huh? What's with that guy? So with these cards, I'm gonna run into people from the past. I have no idea who, but it'll be fun!

Heartache.Line: That guy wasn't kidding around. I really can't remember who it was I met just now. Or can I? I give up. I don't remember. That's weird. I don't know what this is. Wait, is this...what heartache feels like? Just thinking about them...causes pain inside. Hold on. If I really forgot about all those friends completely, that would mean I shouldn't be missing anyone. That makes sense. So I haven't forgotten all of it then! There's got to be more I still don't know. I just need to find something to trigger my memory! Nice! Here goes!

The Hurt is the Key.Line: So Sora, how was your time with---who was it again? You seem pretty calm. Guess you decided they weren't worth stressing over. Out of sight, out of mind, right? What?...Right on schedule.

I can't remember anything at all. But you already knew that, didn't you? That's wrong. It's like you said; everyone I met I can't remember. But still, I'm frustrated that I've forgotten them. I feel moments of loneliness. You said there would be no hurt feelings, but I AM hurting. When the memories are gone, they just leave a hole. And having that longing inside me hurts. But it'll help me, somewhere down the road. It's the key I'll need to unlock all my memories.

The Hurt and the Darkness.Line: The sadness of knowing you forgot someone who matters to you, something like that'll gnaw at you forever. But you believe that somehow by carrying around that kind of hurt, you'll be able to retrieve the memories you lost. That's what you're thinking, right, Sora? I can't believe you fell for it so easily. I told you when you arrived. Remember, in this place, to find is to lose and to lose is to find. Well, you've lost your memories and the only thing you found in return...is hurt. And by deciding that hurt was the key to remembering, you gave up all hope of ever being free from it! The hurt owns you now, Sora. Don't you see that? It's a wound that will never mend. That hole in your heart will grow bigger, until darkness finally claims it! Afraid so. And all it took was a handful of illusions. Your heart was just way too easy to break, Sora.
Right. What's so funny? Huh? The darkness... Was this all just a big trick to pull me in? Not true!

Lost and Confused.Line: It's not too late to run. Why should you keep the hurt inside? Just tell yourself you need to forget about the people you met in this place. You'll have no one to miss. No cause for loneliness. No hurt to keep eating away at your heart. Sora, it's your call. Cling to the memories you've lost, and the hurt they bring, till you're dragged into the darkness. Otherwise, let it all go and then you can be free and happy. The decision...is completely yours.

Huh? Wait! Should I use this? But if I were to do that, then I'd meet a friend, and forget right away. I don't know if I want that. It's just going to bring more hurt. And if he's right, the darkness will eventually...take over me completely. But I don't see any other way out of here. Guess this card is my only option. That is unless, I let go of the hurt. Once I go out of this room, I'll forget all about what happened and everyone I just met. Instead of carrying that hurt around until it consumes me, maybe I should let it go. What's inside my heart? What am I supposed to do? I feel so lost. Huh? I know that voice! Mickey, is that you? Where are you? It's okay. Hey, Mickey? Maybe you can help me with something. I keep forgetting people I meet in this place. And this guy says if I dwell on what I've lost, the hurt is going to take over me. And I don't want that. Huh? Who are they? How can that be? I don't know...what this is. Who are these two? I don't think that we've ever met. But I feel like...I know them. So it's not what's missing that's causing the hurt. It's actually what's NOT missing. If that's true---Hey! Mickey! I'm all alone again. I hate feeling like this. Oh! I wonder... Does this count as hurt? If I let it, will this pull me into the darkness? I can do this. There's no going back. Just one more card.

Hey, Sora! Can you hear me? Sora? Sorry, Sora. I'm still trying to find a way to get to you. Right now, the best I can do is to send my voice to where you are. I understand. Question is, are ya okay with letting go of the folks that you've forgotten? Well, even though you may not remember them...they definitely remember you. You'll always be a really close friend to them, no matter what happens. Why don't you ask your heart? What are you feeling right now, Sora? Memories can disappear, but feelings don't...not even when your data was reset. Inside your heart, the adventures you shared with the friends you made in the datascape will always live on. And ya know what? I'll bet that's also true for all the time you spent with the folks that those cards showed to you. Uh oh! Looks like I've used up too much power. I'll be there soon, Sora. I promise. Just try and hold on a little bit longer for me, okay?
Yeah! We've been on adventures, and I'll never forget you!
And even if you don't ever really know who we are, I hope you'll remember that you'll always be special to us.

An Unexpected Bond.Line: You've used up all the cards, I take it? I would ask if you enjoyed your little trip...but we both know that you've forgotten it. Bet you're feeling pretty empty. So you hurt. I warned you. Don't you remember what I said? That hurt will drag you down into the darkness. You have to get rid of all of it. The darkness will take you first. You say you accept it? It's not a game! It's way past time that you learned what real hurt feels like! Come on, Sora. Do it. Finish me off! Why won't you do it?...I get it. You've seen through my disguise. I'm just like everyone else you've encountered in this place---made of data. I'm not even worth the effort, is that what it is? Guess there's no point in destroying something if it never existed. Is that right? "Can't be all that bad"? All right, I give up. Here. You pass, Sora. Congratulations, you understand hurt. Now, use this to find the truth. My role was to see if you were ready to take ownership of the hurt inside you. And now that role is done. Nothing left for me to do, but...go away. I don't know if I really have one. But...there's a place I'd like to be. Summer vacation.

No, I'm not. I may not remember who I met, but I do remember that I met them. And knowing that I've forgotten them...I miss them. No, I don't. I can keep the hurt because it reminds me of something important. It lets me know that what I've forgotten is crucial. That's enough. I won't run from it. It'll stay inside of my heart, until the day I remember. If I put the hurt aside, I'll lose my ties to all the people I care about. My mind's made up. I may end up falling into the darkness, but I'll carry this with me. I'll only get rid of it when I remember everything, and not a day sooner than that. I'll keep the hurt with me for the time being. It's all that I have. It's what holds the pieces in place. I accept that. Not at all. You say that you're an illusion, but you certainly pack a really big punch. You said that you'd show me hurt, and you weren't wrong. Actually, the hurt that I just felt...was more than that. Sure, it might have hurt while we were fighting, but I sensed a different kind of hurt from you. It was kind of like...an intense, sharp pain. But it... felt sort of familiar, almost like it was my own. As if we'd been connected, like right then we shared the same hurt. If somehow, it brings me closer to people in that kind of way...then carrying around a little hurt can't be all that bad. What do you mean? Are you gonna go back home? A place? Uh...where? What's...this feeling? I've got memories that don't belong to me. A place to call home. And a sunset, that's comforting. My first and my last...You can rest easy. I've got you now. Mickey! It's okay. You're here now. Look! If I use this card, it'll lead us to the truth. Let's find out!

Sora! I'm so glad I finally caught up to ya! Sorry that it took me so long. I know you ended up having to do all the work on your own. I just couldn't get here sooner. Is that right? The message said, "Their hurting will be mended when you return to end it." Maybe now we can finally solve it.

Hidden Memories.Line: Who're you? It's like when I met Mickey. I don't know you, but you're familiar. Uh...so...what exactly is going on here? Wow, you really did that for me, Naminé? You deserve a big thanks! Huh? These...are my memories? Huh? Isn't it weird for somebody else's memories to be inside me? Uh, guys? You...kinda lost me a few minutes ago. I did? It'll bring us closer together; the hurt will only make us stronger. I'm willing to try! I'm ready to face all those memories that you found. It might have to be painful, but I can take it. Yep! Uh-huh! Who...? Naminé, that's you! Who's the other girl? She feels so...familiar. ...And something happened. Something terrible. Didn't it? Funny. I feel as though...I've met them. Yeah... Just a second. Our promise... Your promise to the me I don't know. You kept it, right? So what happens to YOU---the one that's right here? Along with everybody connected to Sora... Naminé, you got it. Oh yeah! I almost forgot. I have a message for you, too. Thank you.

Nice to meet you, Sora. I'm Naminé. You may not know who it is I am, but I know things about you. No, I don't. I put your memories back together that part is true. But it was also me... I was the one who took them apart in the first place. Not only that, the reason all of the bugs appeared in Jiminy's journal... That was me. It all began with these memories that were sleeping way down deep---deep in Sora's heart. Actually, no, they're not yours. They belong to people who are connected to you. Yes, usually it's impossible. When I first found them while repairing your memory, I thought I had made some sort of mistake. But then, after searching for answers, all the evidence I found proved they belong in your heart. Sora will have to awaken these memories, but this is where they will sleep until that time comes. They are important...and yet, dangerous too. These memories, all of them are too painful. Handled the wrong way, they could damage Sora's heart, even break it. That's why I needed for Sora to find a way to face that kind of hurt. So I left the message for all of you. When I unraveled Sora and the others' memories, it also erased the words  in Jiminy's journal. That book was filled with pages and pages of memories from your first adventure. It shows how deeply the journal and Sora are connected. When I took Sora's memories apart, they stayed in his heart. It may have looked like they were gone, but they were there the whole time. Even after the text disappeared from the journal, the memories remained. That's why you were able to render them as data. That was...me, too. When I added these memories to the journal, I also added all this "hurt."
